# General ignores
*.swp
*.swo
*.tmp
*.log
*.bak

# Compiled source files
*.o
*.obj
*.elf
*.bin
*.hex
*.map
*.d

# Build output directory
/build/
\build/

# IDE specific files (add your IDE specific files here if you use one)
.vscode/
.idea/
*.code-workspace
*.DS_Store

# Core dumps
*.core

# ESP-IDF specific files
*.idf.py
sdkconfig
sdkconfig.old
config/
idf.env

# CMake specific files
CMakeCache.txt
CMakeFiles/
cmake_install.cmake
CMakeLists.txt.user

# Python virtual environment
venv/
.venv/
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]

# Other generated files
tags
cscope.out

# By adding any additional tools you use that create temporary or build-related files
